Navigation
Name Errors/Dynamic/IllegalArgument
Synopsis A function is called with an illegal argument value.
Examples 
rascal>NOW = $2013-01-13T22:16:51.740+01:00;
datetime: $2013-01-13T22:16:51.740+01:00
rascal>NOW.month = 13;
org.eclipse.imp.pdb.facts.exceptions.InvalidDateTimeException: Cannot create datetime with provided values.(internal error)	somewhere in: shell

	somewhere in: compileConcept
	somewhere in: compileCourse
	somewhere in: compile
	somewhere in: ___TUTOR___
